input.sentences: a mexican-theme party was thrown at an office .
folding tables were set up on which the food was placed .
the food consisted of tacos | beans and chips .
a pinata hung from the ceiling .
a blind-folded man was able to hit and break the pinata .
output.sentences: A cultural theme party was thrown the other night.
Tables with cultural food were set in the hall.
My favorite food was the tacos which consisted of a special sauce with which I wasn't familiar.
Our friend had a hilarious time hitting the pinata which hung from the ceiling.
She hit the pinata so much that it eventually folded, and all the candy spilled out!
